CatDescriptText: Cutline of related images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper reads;" When Pittsburgh chooses a queen there is much ado. Pictured in layout, left to right: Mrs. Stanley Williams, mother of Beatrice, "Miss Pittsburgh", lovely Beatrice Williams; Billy Rowe awards the prizes; Marian Whitlock, third; Beatrice Williams, first; Edith Mills, "Miss Alternate;"  The judges pose with the queen: Lionel Hampton, "Miss Pittsburgh," John Borican, Maurice Dancer, all of New York.  Directly above: A striking pose of "Miss Pittsburgh," who will compete for the title, "Miss Bronze America," at the Chicago Expo, August 26."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of fifteen women wearing long gowns, including Beatrice Williams in center wearing sash inscribed "Miss Pittsburgh..." posed in interior with grand piano and ferns
